title: Pursuit
description: Started working on this some time around 2024

details.longDescription: I started this project in 2024, as I really wanted to make a parkour tag game for a while. This project helpled me learn a lot, from monetization to custom physics controls. It's currently on hiatus, but in the future I hope to recreate or improve the current project into something new

title: Basic Parkour System
description: Cool parkour system I used to rework Pursuit's parkour system
